The post Rang de Basanti appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Rang de Basanti

Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a Fun event named “RANG DE BASANTI”. It was an online reel submission event. This event was conducted on 5th & 6th February 2022.

It had 45 registrations and 27 responses from participants.

Event Details –
It was a reel-making event. This event was categorized into 3 parts. The participant could make reels on any of the following categories –

  1. Kite making: – They can make handmade Kites with their unique ideas and send us a video or picture of them.
  2. Food Mania: – They can make food as per theme and click its pictures or make a video while making it.
  3. Dress up: – They can dress up as per theme and can add their pictures in reels.

The submissions were done via Google form.

The post Race to Win appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Race to Win

Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a Fun event named “RACE TO WIN”. It was a three-round event, Round 1 was conducted on 12th October 2021 and Round 2 and 3 were conducted on 13th October 2021. The event was conducted on campus grounds near Nescafe where all participants were called for a series of rounds involving mind-body coordination type games. There were 100 online registrations and 39 on-spot registration with a total of 139 students participating in this event.

Below are the details of the event: –

Round 1: –

The first round ‘Galaxy Racer’ was broken into 3 parts:-

  • Part 1- Bucket-ball Challenge from 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM
  • Part 2- Bowl the cup from 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
  • Part 3- Pic a treasure from 4:32 PM to 4:42 PM

Participants: – 23 Teams

Round 2: –

The second round ‘Guess the building’ held from 3:30 PM to 4:30 PM.

Participants: – 8 Teams

Round 3: –

The third round ‘Blow the balloons’ was conducted from 4:45 PM to 4:49 PM.

Participants: – 4 Teams

3 teams were given 1st, 2nd, and 3rd positions as listed below.

The post Design Mania appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Design Mania

Detailed Rules and Regulations:
1. Register for the event Here
2. You will be added to the WhatsApp group of the event.
3. The name of the game is (MultiCraft) you can download it from Play Store or by using this link:
For Android:- Download
For iOS:- Download
4. Design the Civil Engineering Structure in single-player creative mode. (Try to build your structure offline as the game may contain some ads)
5. Afterdesigningconverttheworldofyours into zip format. Place the zip file in your google drive and provide the link to us.
6. Demo video for this will be available on WhatsApp group.
7. You need to upload a total of 4 files by using this link
•Screenshot of your structure when it is
25% complete
50%complete
75% complete
•Zip file of your world in-game.

The aim  of this competition wasto enhance the creative skills, artistic skills, technical  skills, ability to work & thinking capacity. The event held from 10th April 2021  to 17th April 2021. It was a submission […]

The post Skillenzia appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
Skillenzia, an online event organised by Association of Civil Engineering  Students for the students of Guru Nanak Dev Engineering College. The aim  of this competition wasto enhance the creative skills, artistic skills, technical  skills, ability to work & thinking capacity. The event held from 10th April 2021  to 17th April 2021. It was a submission type event and submissions were  accepted through guru.gndec.ac.in / moodle.

The event consists of three categories –

  1. Meme-O-mania
  2. Pixel ‘21
  3. VID ‘21

The Topics of the event were:

  • Meme-O-mania – Online classes
  • Pixel ’21 – Reflection
  • VID ’21- Sustainable development

The event was judged by Prof. Yuvraj Singh. The event was conducted  successfully even in the online event. So, with the current state of things  prompting colleges to digitally engage their students in virtual events. A  number of students showed interest in the event by registering in the event  of skillenzia. Winners were honored with appreciation certificate and the  participants with participation certificates.

item.title: Farewell 404 Batch 2020
item.dc:creator: Sharanjit Singh
item.description:
In this situation of pandemic Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a virtual farewell party “FAREWELL 404” on 6th September 2020 on ZOOM APP where we all bid farewell to our seniors of the outgoing batch (2016-20) with great enthusiasm and of course nostalgia.The Event started at 4:20 PM with a welcoming speech then our […]

The post Farewell 404 Batch 2020 appeared first on Association of Civil Engineering Students.
item.content:encoded:
In this situation of pandemic Association of civil engineering students (ACES) organized a virtual farewell party “FAREWELL 404” on 6th September 2020 on ZOOM APP where we all bid farewell to our seniors of the outgoing batch (2016-20) with great enthusiasm and of course nostalgia.
The Event started at 4:20 PM with a welcoming speech then our faculty advisor Prof. Sukwinderpal Singh, Prof. Yuvraj Singh, and Prof. CHARNJEET SINGH shared a few words with us, followed by the speech of honorable Head of the department Dr. Hardeep Singh Rai. He is motivated and wishes our seniors a bright career and happy life ahead.


Finally, the event closed with the prized words of Prof. Yuvraj Singh.
The Event comprised 3 games:

  1. Emoji to movie.
  2. Two Truth One Lie.
  3. Rapid Fire.
Then Some titles of the above games were given to the Winners
